attributes.action: Let Year 7 Children Choose Which Subjects They Want To Study
attributes.additional_details: Children just starting secondary school should be able to choose which subjects they would like to study in due course. They should all do compulsory subjects such as Maths,English and Sciences, but should have freedom over other subjects that they think are not as significant for them. The Government should let children choose which subjects they want to do, and not make them do subjects that they think will waste their time, or are pointless.
